title: Leadership Practical Skills Enhancement: IVR-Based Geographical General Knowledge Exploration Program

context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can analyze Earth’s topographical features in IVR environments and connect them to three or more geographical phenomena
Learners can complete one geographical reasoning project utilizing geographic data collected in virtual reality
Learners can create geographical concept maps based on spatial orientation experiences during IVR learning
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
